title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface, model manager, RAG).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + llama.cpp embeddings and a vector DB.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for popular OSS models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats via Ollama with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM code.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with streaming chat completions (NuGet: Ollama).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models (Bolt JS).

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in pipelines.
